name: Albert Sunny
content: Albert Sunny Associate Professor Computer Science and Engineering Indian Institute of Technology Palakkad E-mail: albert[at]iitpkd[dot]ac[dot]in Phone: +91 4923 226 389 I work on modelling, analysis and resource allocation in distributed and interconnected systems with a special focus on computer and communication systems. My preferred areas of research are theoretical in nature. I am also interested in exploring experimental/simulation-based approaches. Openings I am looking for motivated M.S/Ph.D./Post-Doc students. If you are interested to work with me, drop me an e-mail.
